;---- TENGIR ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; mind that Lithuania shares "pagan" religion so you need to provide below coding excluding it
; to avoid situation when the Lithuanian AI cannot build own temples - there's a script destroying Tengir temples in settlements owned by Lithuania (and vice versa)

building temple_tengir
{
  convert_to temple_tengir_castle
  religion pagan
  levels tengir_altar tengir_sanctuary tengir_temple
  {
    tengir_altar city requires factions { cumans, mongols, } and hidden_resource tartars
    {
      convert_to 0
      capability
      {
		religion_level bonus 1  requires factions { cumans, mongols, }

		law_bonus bonus 1  requires factions { cumans, mongols, }
		
		happiness_bonus bonus 3 requires region_religion pagan 70
		happiness_bonus bonus 2 requires region_religion pagan 40 and not region_religion pagan 70
		happiness_bonus bonus 1 requires region_religion pagan 10 and not region_religion pagan 40
		
        population_growth_bonus bonus 1  requires factions { cumans, mongols, }
		}
      material wooden
      construction  2
      cost  2000
      settlement_min village
      upgrades
      {
        tengir_sanctuary
      }
    }
    tengir_sanctuary city requires factions { cumans, mongols, } and hidden_resource tartars
    {
      capability
      {
        religion_level bonus 2  requires factions { cumans, mongols, }

		law_bonus bonus 2  requires factions { cumans, mongols, }
		
		happiness_bonus bonus 4 requires region_religion pagan 70
		happiness_bonus bonus 3 requires region_religion pagan 40 and not region_religion pagan 70
		happiness_bonus bonus 2 requires region_religion pagan 10 and not region_religion pagan 40
		
        population_growth_bonus bonus 2  requires factions { cumans, mongols, }
		
        agent priest 0 requires factions { cumans, mongols, }
        agent_limit priest 0
        agent_limit priest 1 requires factions { cumans, mongols, }

        agent diplomat 0  requires factions { cumans, mongols, } and event_counter mongols_invasion_warn 1
        agent_limit diplomat 0	
        agent_limit diplomat 1 requires factions { cumans, mongols, } and event_counter mongols_invasion_warn 1
      }
      material wooden
      construction  3
      cost  3000
      settlement_min large_town
      upgrades
      {
        tengir_temple
      }
    }
    tengir_temple city requires factions { cumans, mongols, } and hidden_resource tartars
    {
      capability
      {
        religion_level bonus 3  requires factions { cumans, mongols, }
		
		law_bonus bonus 3  requires factions { cumans, mongols, }
		
		happiness_bonus bonus 5 requires region_religion pagan 70
		happiness_bonus bonus 4 requires region_religion pagan 40 and not region_religion pagan 70
		happiness_bonus bonus 3 requires region_religion pagan 10 and not region_religion pagan 40
		
        population_growth_bonus bonus 3  requires factions { cumans, mongols, }
		
        agent priest 0 requires factions { cumans, mongols, }
        agent_limit priest 0
        agent_limit priest 1 requires factions { cumans, mongols, }

        agent diplomat  0  requires factions { cumans, mongols, } and event_counter mongols_invasion_warn 1
        agent_limit diplomat 0	
        agent_limit diplomat 1 requires factions { cumans, } and event_counter mongols_invasion_warn 1
        agent_limit diplomat 1 requires factions { mongols, }
      }
      material wooden
      construction  4
      cost  4000
      settlement_min city
      upgrades
      {
      }
    }
  }
  plugins
  {
  }
}

building temple_tengir_castle
{
  convert_to temple_tengir
  religion pagan
  levels c_tengir_altar
  {
    c_tengir_altar castle requires factions { cumans, mongols, } and hidden_resource tartars
    {
      convert_to 0
      capability
      {
        religion_level bonus 3  requires factions { cumans, mongols, }
        law_bonus bonus 3
        happiness_bonus bonus 3
        population_growth_bonus bonus 3  requires factions { cumans, mongols, }

        agent diplomat  0  requires factions { cumans, mongols, } and event_counter mongols_invasion_warn 1
        agent_limit diplomat 0	
        agent_limit diplomat 1 requires factions { cumans, } and event_counter mongols_invasion_warn 1
        agent_limit diplomat 1 requires factions { mongols, }
      }
      material wooden
      construction  2
      cost  1000
      settlement_min village
      upgrades
      {
      }
    }
  }
  plugins
  {
  }
}

building city_hall
{
  levels town_hall council_chambers city_hall mayors_palace
  {
    town_hall city requires factions { northern_european, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } and building_present_min_level builders builders2 and not building_present_min_level grasslands nomad_encampment
    {
      capability
      {
		law_bonus bonus 2
        population_growth_bonus bonus 1 requires event_counter new_era_begins 1		
		
	;-Diplomat recruitment - to be deleted after diplomats are added to the unique buildings for each faction

        agent diplomat 0 requires factions { denmark, } and hidden_resource capital
        agent diplomat 0 requires factions { rum, turks, } and hidden_resource capital
        agent diplomat 0 requires factions { hungary, } and hidden_resource capital

        agent_limit diplomat 0
        agent_limit diplomat 1 requires factions { denmark, } and hidden_resource capital
        agent_limit diplomat 1 requires factions { rum, turks, } and hidden_resource capital
        agent_limit diplomat 1 requires factions { hungary, } and hidden_resource capital
		agent_limit diplomat 1 requires factions { all, } and not event_counter is_the_player 1

;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; UPKEEP/INCOME		
		income_bonus bonus -50
      }
      material wooden
      construction  3
      cost  3000
      settlement_min large_town
      upgrades
      {
        council_chambers
      }
    }
    council_chambers city requires factions { northern_european, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } and building_present_min_level builders builders3 and not building_present_min_level grasslands grasslands
    {
      capability
      {		
		law_bonus bonus 4
        population_growth_bonus bonus 1 requires not event_counter new_era_begins 1
        population_growth_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter new_era_begins 1

	;-Diplomat recruitment - to be deleted after diplomats are added to the unique buildings for each faction

        agent diplomat 0 requires factions { denmark, } and hidden_resource capital
        agent diplomat 0 requires factions { rum, turks, } and hidden_resource capital
        agent diplomat 0 requires factions { hungary, } and hidden_resource capital

        agent_limit diplomat 0
        agent_limit diplomat 1 requires factions { denmark, } and hidden_resource capital
        agent_limit diplomat 1 requires factions { rum, turks, } and hidden_resource capital
        agent_limit diplomat 1 requires factions { hungary, } and hidden_resource capital
		agent_limit diplomat 2 requires factions { all, } and not event_counter is_the_player 1
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; UPKEEP/INCOME		
		income_bonus bonus -100
      }
      material stone
      construction  4
      cost  6000
      settlement_min city
      upgrades
      {
        city_hall
      }
    }
    city_hall city requires factions { northern_european, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } and building_present_min_level builders builders4 and not building_present_min_level grasslands grasslands and building_present_min_level education_university school
    {
      capability
      {	
		recruit_pool	"Carroccio Standard V"  1   0.13   1  0  requires factions { venice, pisa, } and event_counter HEAVY_MAIL_ARMOR 1

		;----- special units: only in Constantinople
		recruit_pool	"Varangian Guard"	0	0.09	2  0  requires factions { byzantium, } and hidden_resource capital and hidden_resource byzantium
		recruit_pool	"Scholarii"			0	0.07	2  0  requires factions { byzantium, } and hidden_resource capital and hidden_resource byzantium

		law_bonus bonus 8
        population_growth_bonus bonus 3 requires not event_counter new_era_begins 1
        population_growth_bonus bonus 4 requires event_counter new_era_begins 1

	;-Diplomat recruitment - to be deleted after diplomats are added to the unique buildings for each faction

        agent diplomat 0 requires factions { denmark, } and hidden_resource capital
        agent diplomat 0 requires factions { rum, turks, } and hidden_resource capital
        agent diplomat 0 requires factions { hungary, } and hidden_resource capital

        agent_limit diplomat 0
        agent_limit diplomat 1 requires factions { denmark, } and hidden_resource capital
        agent_limit diplomat 1 requires factions { rum, turks, } and hidden_resource capital
        agent_limit diplomat 1 requires factions { hungary, } and hidden_resource capital
		agent_limit diplomat 2 requires factions { all, } and not event_counter is_the_player 1

;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; UPKEEP/INCOME		
		income_bonus bonus -200
      }
      material stone
      construction  5
      cost  9000
      settlement_min large_city
      upgrades
      {
        mayors_palace
      }
    }
    mayors_palace city requires factions { northern_european, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } and building_present_min_level builders builders4 and not building_present_min_level grasslands grasslands and building_present_min_level education_university university
    {
      capability

		recruit_pool	"Forlorn Hope"  1   0.25   2  0  requires factions { hre, } and event_counter new_era_begins 1
		recruit_pool	"Famiglia Ducale"  1   0.085   1  0  requires factions { pisa, } and event_counter first_piano 1

		recruit_pool	"Carroccio Standard V"  1   0.2   2  0  requires factions { venice, pisa, } and event_counter HEAVY_MAIL_ARMOR 1

;------- Taverns --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;------- PLEASURE --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

building taverns
{
  convert_to castle_taverns
  levels brothel inn tavern coaching_house pleasure_palace
  {
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================  BROTHEL ====================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================   
    brothel city requires factions { northern_european, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, }
    {
      convert_to 0
      capability
      {
        agent spy  0  requires factions { northern_european, }
        agent spy  0  requires factions { middle_eastern, }
        agent spy  0  requires factions { eastern_european, }
        agent spy  0  requires factions { greek, }
        agent spy  0  requires factions { southern_european, }
		
        agent_limit spy 0
        agent_limit spy 1 requires factions { all, } and hidden_resource capital
		
        happiness_bonus bonus 2 requires not event_counter FL_policy_shady_connections 1 
        happiness_bonus bonus 3 requires event_counter FL_policy_shady_connections 1 
		
        law_bonus bonus -1
		
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; UPKEEP/INCOME		
		income_bonus bonus -50
      }
      material wooden
      construction  2
      cost  2000
      settlement_min town
      upgrades
      {
        inn
      }
    }
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================  INN  ============================================================================================
;================================================================================================================================== 	
    inn city requires factions { northern_european, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } and building_present_min_level builders builders1
    {
      capability
      {
        agent spy  0  requires factions { northern_european, }
        agent spy  0  requires factions { middle_eastern, }
        agent spy  0  requires factions { eastern_european, }
        agent spy  0  requires factions { greek, }
        agent spy  0  requires factions { southern_european, }

        agent_limit spy 1
		
        happiness_bonus bonus 4 requires not event_counter FL_policy_shady_connections 1 
        happiness_bonus bonus 5 requires event_counter FL_policy_shady_connections 1 
		
        law_bonus bonus -2
		
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; UPKEEP/INCOME		
		income_bonus bonus -100
      }
      material wooden
      construction  3
      cost  4000
      settlement_min large_town
      upgrades
      {
        tavern
      }
    }
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================  tavern  ============================================================================================
;================================================================================================================================== 	
    tavern city requires factions { northern_european, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } and building_present_min_level builders builders2
    {

      {

        agent spy  0  requires factions { greek, }
        agent spy  0  requires factions { southern_european, }

        agent_limit spy 1
		
        agent assassin  0  requires factions { northern_european, }
        agent assassin  0  requires factions { middle_eastern, }
        agent assassin  0  requires factions { eastern_european, }
        agent assassin  0  requires factions { greek, }
        agent assassin  0  requires factions { southern_european, }

        agent_limit assassin 1
		
        happiness_bonus bonus 6 requires not event_counter FL_policy_shady_connections 1 
        happiness_bonus bonus 7 requires event_counter FL_policy_shady_connections 1
		
        law_bonus bonus -3
		
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; UPKEEP/INCOME		
		income_bonus bonus -200
      }
      material wooden
      construction  4
      cost  6000
      settlement_min city
      upgrades
      {
        coaching_house
      }
    }
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================  coaching_house  ============================================================================================

    coaching_house city requires factions { northern_european, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } and building_present_min_level builders builders3

        agent spy  0  requires factions { southern_european, }

        agent_limit spy 1

        agent assassin  0  requires factions { middle_eastern, }
        agent_limit assassin 1 requires factions { middle_eastern, }
		
        happiness_bonus bonus 2

;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; UPKEEP/INCOME		
		income_bonus bonus -50		
      }
      material wooden
      construction  2
      cost  1250
      settlement_min large_town
      upgrades
      {
      }
    }
  }
  plugins
  {
  }

;==================================================================================================================================
;===================  Urban Equestrian (aka Racing Sports)  =======================================================================
;================================================================================================================================== 
; put additional event_counter when evolution of Byzantium or other factions coded in script.txt
; warning: if more event_counter are used with "or" clause, then the building becomes visible to all factions (even Latin, pagan)
; also to restrict building of hippodroms for Georgia to later times (after one of reforms)

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@   HORSE RACES
building urban_equestrian
{
  levels racing_track sultans_racing_track hippodrom
  {
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================  RACING TRACK  ===============================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================   
; available for all factions in the southern regions of the map
;	 racing_track city requires factions { all, } and not building_present tourney and building_present_min_level landowners landowners3 or building_present_min_level autonomy autonomy3 and hidden_resource aragon or hidden_resource spain or hidden_resource portugal or hidden_resource moors or hidden_resource egypt or hidden_resource zengid or hidden_resource abbasid or hidden_resource turks or hidden_resource rum or hidden_resource byzantium 
	
	racing_track city requires factions { middle_eastern, byzantium, georgia, } and not building_present_min_level tourney jousting_lists and building_present_min_level landowners landowners3 or building_present_min_level autonomy autonomy3
    {
      capability
      {
        stage_races 1
		population_growth_bonus bonus 1		
        law_bonus bonus -1
		
        happiness_bonus bonus 1	requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, eastern_european, serbia, }
		
		happiness_bonus bonus 2	requires factions { middle_eastern, } and not event_counter omar_khayyam 1				; at some point put a more pertinent event here!
        happiness_bonus bonus 3	requires factions { middle_eastern, } and event_counter omar_khayyam 1 and not event_counter yunus_emre 1
        happiness_bonus bonus 4	requires factions { middle_eastern, } and event_counter yunus_emre 1
		
        happiness_bonus bonus 2	requires factions { byzantium, } and not event_counter BYZANTIUM2_ANNA_COMNENA 1					; turn 42, but one may put a different event
        happiness_bonus bonus 3	requires factions { byzantium, } and event_counter BYZANTIUM2_ANNA_COMNENA 1 and not event_counter BYZANTIUM6_BYZANTINE_RENAISSANCE_STARTED 1	
        happiness_bonus bonus 4	requires factions { byzantium, } and event_counter BYZANTIUM6_BYZANTINE_RENAISSANCE_STARTED 1	
		
        happiness_bonus bonus 2	requires factions { georgia, } and not event_counter GEORGIAN3_SHOTA_RUSTAVELI 1		; turn 111 or so
        happiness_bonus bonus 3	requires factions { georgia, } and event_counter GEORGIAN3_SHOTA_RUSTAVELI 1 and not event_counter GEORGIAN6_REVIVAL 1 
        happiness_bonus bonus 4	requires factions { georgia, } and event_counter GEORGIAN6_REVIVAL 1 
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; UPKEEP/INCOME		
		income_bonus bonus -100
      }
      material wooden
      construction  2
      cost  2000
      settlement_min city
      upgrades
      {
        sultans_racing_track
      }
    }
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================  HIPPODROM  ==================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================  	
    sultans_racing_track city requires factions { middle_eastern, byzantium, georgia, } and not building_present tourney and building_present_min_level landowners landowners4 or building_present_min_level autonomy autonomy3
    {
      capability
      {
        stage_races 2
		population_growth_bonus bonus 2
        law_bonus bonus -2
        happiness_bonus bonus 3	requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, eastern_european, serbia, }		
        happiness_bonus bonus 5	requires factions { middle_eastern, } and not event_counter omar_khayyam 1				; at some point put a more pertinent event here!
        happiness_bonus bonus 6	requires factions { middle_eastern, } and event_counter omar_khayyam 1 and not event_counter yunus_emre 1
        happiness_bonus bonus 7	requires factions { middle_eastern, } and event_counter yunus_emre 1
        happiness_bonus bonus 5	requires factions { byzantium, } and not event_counter BYZANTIUM2_ANNA_COMNENA 1					; turn 42, but one may put a different event
        happiness_bonus bonus 6	requires factions { byzantium, } and event_counter BYZANTIUM2_ANNA_COMNENA 1 and not event_counter BYZANTIUM6_BYZANTINE_RENAISSANCE_STARTED 1	
        happiness_bonus bonus 7	requires factions { byzantium, } and event_counter BYZANTIUM6_BYZANTINE_RENAISSANCE_STARTED 1	
        happiness_bonus bonus 5	requires factions { georgia, } and not event_counter GEORGIAN3_SHOTA_RUSTAVELI 1				; turn 111 or so
        happiness_bonus bonus 6	requires factions { georgia, } and event_counter GEORGIAN3_SHOTA_RUSTAVELI 1 and not event_counter GEORGIAN6_REVIVAL 1 
        happiness_bonus bonus 7	requires factions { georgia, } and event_counter GEORGIAN6_REVIVAL 1

;---- Charity (city) ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==============================================================================================================================
;==============================================================================================================================
; This building replaced building chains that existed in SSHIP 092-97: orphan, monastery_castle, friar.
; Its main role is to increase prevent plagues and to lower unrest (but not to grow a city!).
; In the future:
; - "event_counter FL_policy_thinks_of_his_people 1" should be employed (allowing building the thing at all?).
; - more intricate historical conditions for increase of population bonus.

; can be updated with Leproserie (for NE)

; For the Greeks: charity5 should be dependent on the event BYZANTINE_PANTOKRATOR

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@

{   
	levels charity3 charity4 charity5
    {
        charity3 city requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, eastern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and building_present_min_level city_hall council_chambers
        {
            capability
            {
           	happiness_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { all, } and not event_counter FL_policy_thinks_of_his_people 1
           	happiness_bonus bonus 2 requires factions { all, } and event_counter FL_policy_thinks_of_his_people 1
			
            population_health_bonus bonus 3  requires factions { greek, middle_eastern, }

;==============================================================================================================================
;==============================================================================================================================
;---- Ports -----------------=-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==============================================================================================================================
;==============================================================================================================================

; There was a limited progress in boat-building and navigation during the early and high Middle Ages, but a significant one towards the end of the era. There're three processes:
; - development of the cog in the North (Atlantic - North Sea - the Baltics): cog - holk - carrack.
; - growth (mainly in size) of the galleys in the Mediterranean (dromon - galley - war galley).
; - meeting of technological achievements from both spheres in the Late MA in Iberia - leading to the carrack.
; There's been a significant progress in navigation - that is reflected in the stats of the units (caravel, carrack).

; General assumptions:
;  Denmark, Norway - very good ships, but only from Skandinavia and no technological progress. In the High MA they should switch to cogs.
;  Poland, Hungary, Lithuania, Kiev, Novgorod - landlocked nations, very limited number of ships; more to be received from the Hanseatic / Merchant buildings.
;  HRE, France, England, Scotland - average numbers.
;  Spain, Sicily, Jerusalem - average numbers.
;  Byzantium - average numbers, but de facto high thanks to the highest level of ports (basically, from Constantinople).
;  Georgia, Serbia - landlocked nations, very limited ships; will get more from Hanseatic / Merchant buildings.
;  Portugal, Aragon, Pisa, Venice - the best ships, large numbers (will also get from special buildings?)
;  Muslim - low numbers, exception: Moors: average.
;  Cumans, Mongols - extremely low access to ships.

; Main events in the SSHIP impacting on the units and recruitment:
; - ROLES_D_OLERON - 
; - HANSEATIC_COG 
; - CARTA_PISANA - developments 
; - al Idrisi - ?

; Information about the system below:
; - papal_states have no access to ships from lvl1 - this is intended to prevent the AI from expanding - and might be extended to other levels.
; - the AI needs to be buffed up so there's a second set of recruitment pools that add to the first.
; - no increase in numbers for longboats/dragon boats, only limited for the ladyas.

; Ideas to implement:
; - cogs - universal for all in the North; it should gradually replace longboats, dragon boats and ladyas
; - review of historicality of the ships and the times they appear (baghlah and fire ships - are they historical?)
; - linking the appearance of the types to the historical events
; - Aragon should have access to galleys, not cogs
; - event "

;==============================================================================================================================
;---- River Ports  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==============================================================================================================================
; increases growth and trade potential of the regions with rivers
; can be built practially in any conditions by all factions, cheaply but with long building times at higher levels
; the highest level is available only in 3 provinces of Flanders to depict the historical technological developments there
; in the future there should be special technological conditions added, related to the historical events

; Warning for moders:
; - if you remove "and event_counter dummy 1 or hidden_resource river" from any level, then the whole building chain becomes visible also in provinces where there's no river
; - if you'd like to introduce more complicated conditions then a script has to be written

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@    RIVER PORTS
building river_access
{
  convert_to river_access
  levels riverport2 riverport3 riverport4 riverport5
  {
    riverport2 requires factions { northern_european, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, }  and event_counter dummy 1 or hidden_resource river
    {
      convert_to 0
      capability
      {
        population_growth_bonus bonus 1 requires not event_counter new_era_begins 1
        population_growth_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter new_era_begins 1
		trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires not event_counter new_era_begins 1
		trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter new_era_begins 1
        law_bonus bonus -1
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; UPKEEP/INCOME		
		income_bonus bonus 50
	  }
      material wooden
      construction  4
      cost  6000
      settlement_min large_town
      upgrades
      {
	   riverport3
      }
    }
    riverport3 requires factions { northern_european, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, }  and event_counter dummy 1 or hidden_resource river
    {
      convert_to 1
      capability
      {
        population_growth_bonus bonus 2 requires not event_counter new_era_begins 1

		trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires not event_counter new_era_begins 1
		trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3 requires event_counter new_era_begins 1
        law_bonus bonus -2		
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; UPKEEP/INCOME		
		income_bonus bonus 100
	  }
      material wooden
      construction  6
      cost  12000
      settlement_min city
      upgrades
      {
	   riverport4
      }

; Events important for money (also used in the anti-hoarding mechanism):
; BYZANTIUM21_ADELPHOPOIESIS - year 1250
; MONEY_FIRST_DUCATO - year 1262
; MONEY_FIRST_FLORIN - year 1252
; MONEY_FIRST_ECU - after 1267 (see France evolution)
; MONEY_BARDI_BANK - year 1280
; MONEY_KREMNICA_MINT - year 1320
; POLAND4A_STATUTE_OF_KALISZ - year 1370 (see Poland evolution)
; MONEY_MEDICI_FAMILY - year 1400
; MONEY_FUGGER_FAMILY - year 1420


; Many changes can be done to this building line:
; - Fugger - should probably be localised in Ulm - but the problem is Ulm is a castle (so cannot be built) - maybe create building?
; - not-yet-created events that could play a role here: renovatio monetae, settled merchant
; - presence of the hanse building (throug event_counter) - if eg 10 are built, increase of money from this building
; - England: presence of White Tower? Kernave, Tbilisi, Kiev ?

; At some point write an info how does it behave so that player is aware.

;==================================================================================================================================

;---- Mines -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================

; Mines are buildable only with metals, silver, gold. 
; Stone is mineable with Builders lvl3 and lvl4.
; Salt (coded: tobacco) is not minable with mines because:
;  1. historically mining was not so widespread until High MA, far more common were the salins on seashores,
;  2. the graphical view of a salt reasource with a shaft is not very nice, it's better to leave it without.

; Events pro memoria (turns): high_era 208, late_era 516, OSTSIEDLUNG 60-100 (depending on the player), GEORGIAN2_GOLDEN_AGE 80-140, EUPHROSYNE 150, ECONOMY_NEW_USES_OF_WATER_POWER (player builds 8 water mills), first_blast_furnace 400, IMPROVED_METALLURGY 532

;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================
;---- Slavemarket -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================

;--- RECRUITMENT THAT DEPENDS ON THE EXISTENCE OF 2+ BUILDINGS: 
;make 2 recuitments pools: 
;building 1 provides max pool (eg. recruit_pool	"Unit" 0 0 3 0 requires factions ... )
;building 2 provides pool growth (eg. recruit_pool	"Unit" 0 0.13 0 0 requires factions ... )

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@    SLAVEMARKET
building slavemarket
{
  levels slavemarket slave_trading_center
  {
    slavemarket requires factions { middle_eastern, }
    {
      capability
      {
		; The recruitment pool below is a condition to build slave units by muslim factions
		recruit_pool	"Dismounted Ghulams"	0.9   0.1   0  0  requires factions { turks, rum, } and not event_counter HALF_PLATE_ARMOR 1
		recruit_pool	"Dismounted Ghulams"	0.9   0.15   0  0  requires factions { turks, rum, } and event_counter HALF_PLATE_ARMOR 1
		recruit_pool	"Dismounted Ghulams"	0.9   0.1   0  0  requires factions { egypt, } and not event_counter ayyubids_rise 1

; the main source of the Bedouin units is Oasis building
; with HR desert a building Oasis is available, and Bedouin Cavalry can be recruited there

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@    CARAVAN
building caravan
{
  convert_to castle_caravan
  levels caravan_stop caravanersary silk_road_stop
  {
    caravan_stop city requires factions { middle_eastern, } and hidden_resource caravan or hidden_resource silk_road
    {
      convert_to 0
      capability
      {
		recruit_pool	"Bedouin Cavalry"	1	0.04	2  0  requires factions { all, } and not hidden_resource desert and hidden_resource moors or hidden_resource egypt or hidden_resource zengid or hidden_resource abbasid

		recruit_pool	"Desert Raiders"	1	0.04	2  0  requires factions { all, } and not hidden_resource desert and hidden_resource moors or hidden_resource egypt or hidden_resource zengid or hidden_resource abbasid

        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1
      }
      material wooden
      construction  4
      cost  4000
      settlement_min large_town
      upgrades
      {
        caravanersary
      }
    }
    caravanersary city requires factions { middle_eastern, } and hidden_resource caravan or hidden_resource silk_road
    {
      convert_to 1
      capability
      {
		recruit_pool	"Bedouin Cavalry"	1	0.07	2  0  requires factions { all, } and not hidden_resource desert and hidden_resource moors or hidden_resource egypt or hidden_resource zengid or hidden_resource abbasid

		recruit_pool	"Desert Raiders"	1	0.07	2  0  requires factions { all, } and not hidden_resource desert and hidden_resource moors or hidden_resource egypt or hidden_resource zengid or hidden_resource abbasid
		
        population_growth_bonus bonus 1
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
      }
      material wooden
      construction  6
      cost  6000
      settlement_min city
      upgrades
      {
        silk_road_stop
      }
    }
    silk_road_stop city requires factions { middle_eastern, } and hidden_resource silk_road
    {
      convert_to 1
      capability
      {
		recruit_pool	"Bedouin Cavalry"	1	0.10	2  0  requires factions { all, } and not hidden_resource desert and hidden_resource moors or hidden_resource egypt or hidden_resource zengid or hidden_resource abbasid

		recruit_pool	"Desert Raiders"	1	0.10	2  0  requires factions { all, } and not hidden_resource desert and hidden_resource moors or hidden_resource egypt or hidden_resource zengid or hidden_resource abbasid

;==================================================================================================================================
;================================================================================================================================== OASIS
;---- Oasis -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==================================================================================================================================
; This building is available in 9 provinces with HR desert.
; Lvl 1 is present in all those provinces from be the beginning of the game. It is destructible nonetheless - might be changed in the future.
; It provides trade, population and a AoR units.

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
building oasis_building
{
  convert_to oasis_building
  levels oasis_1 oasis_2 oasis_3 oasis_4 oasis_5
  {
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   OASIS 1 (Oasis)  ===========================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================

    oasis_1 requires factions { northern_european, eastern_european, southern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and hidden_resource desert
    {
	  convert_to 0
      capability
      {
	;--- Public order, population, trade

        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { all, } and not event_counter FL_policy_merchant_skills 1
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires factions { all, } and event_counter FL_policy_merchant_skills 1

	;--- Units
	; at this level available only if the FL has the policy "protector" (interested in defense)

		recruit_pool	"African Tribal Warriors"	0	0.04	0  0  requires factions { all, } and event_counter FL_policy_protector 1 and hidden_resource africa
		
		recruit_pool	"Bedouin Cavalry"			1	0.04	2  0  requires factions { all, } and event_counter FL_policy_protector 1 and hidden_resource moors or hidden_resource egypt or hidden_resource zengid or hidden_resource abbasid
		recruit_pool	"Desert Raiders"			1	0.04	2  0  requires factions { all, } and event_counter FL_policy_protector 1 and hidden_resource moors or hidden_resource egypt or hidden_resource zengid or hidden_resource abbasid		

	;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	; UPKEEP/INCOME 0
      }
      material wooden
      construction 1
      cost 10
      settlement_min village
      upgrades
      {
        oasis_2
      }
    }
	
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   OASIS 2 (Oasis with Granary) ===============================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================

    oasis_2 requires factions { northern_european, eastern_european, southern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and hidden_resource desert
    {
	  convert_to 1
      capability
      {
	;--- Public order, population, trade
	; mind that there's no resource "fruit" (dogs) in any region with desert (so idea of having figs excluded - doesn't make sense)

        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires factions { all, } and not event_counter FL_policy_merchant_skills 1
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3 requires factions { all, } and event_counter FL_policy_merchant_skills 1
		
		farming_level 1 requires factions { all, }		
        religion_level bonus -1

	;--- Units

		recruit_pool	"African Tribal Warriors"	0	0.04	0  0  requires factions { all, } and hidden_resource africa
		
		recruit_pool	"Bedouin Cavalry"			1	0.04	2  0  requires factions { all, } and hidden_resource moors or hidden_resource egypt or hidden_resource zengid or hidden_resource abbasid
		recruit_pool	"Desert Raiders"			1	0.04	2  0  requires factions { all, } and event_counter FL_policy_protector 1 and hidden_resource moors or hidden_resource egypt or hidden_resource zengid or hidden_resource abbasid	

	;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	; UPKEEP/INCOME 0
      }
      material wooden
      construction 3
      cost 3000
      settlement_min village
      upgrades
      {
        oasis_3
      }
    }

;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   OASIS 3 (Desert Village)  ==================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================

    oasis_3 requires factions { northern_european, eastern_european, southern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and hidden_resource desert
    {
	  convert_to 2
      capability
      {
	;--- Public order, population, trade

        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3 requires factions { all, } and not event_counter FL_policy_merchant_skills 1
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 4 requires factions { all, } and event_counter FL_policy_merchant_skills 1
		
		farming_level 2 requires factions { all, }		
        religion_level bonus -1

	;--- Units
	; you don't need to add HR desert here as it's already a requirement for the very existance of the building

		recruit_pool	"African Tribal Warriors"	0	0.07	0  0  requires factions { all, } and hidden_resource africa
		
		recruit_pool	"Bedouin Cavalry"			1	0.07	2  0  requires factions { all, } and hidden_resource moors or hidden_resource egypt or hidden_resource zengid or hidden_resource abbasid
		recruit_pool	"Desert Raiders"			1	0.04	2  0  requires factions { all, } and hidden_resource moors or hidden_resource egypt or hidden_resource zengid or hidden_resource abbasid
		
	    recruit_pool	"Camel Gunners"				1	0.04	2  0  requires factions { moors, } and event_counter pike_and_shot 1 and hidden_resource africa

	;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	; UPKEEP/INCOME
		income_bonus bonus 50
      }
      material wooden
      construction 4
      cost 6000
      settlement_min town
      upgrades
      {
        oasis_4
      }
    }

      capability

      }
      material wooden
      construction 8
      cost 8000
      settlement_min large_town
      upgrades
      {
        oasis_5
      }
    }

;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================		ALCAZAR
;---- Alcazar ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================
; can be built in Iberia and Maghreb provinces by 4 Iberian Catholic factions and all Muslim factions
; the Almoravids can build lvl1 and lvl2 everywhere

; Further work on this building chain:
; - check and add military units: knights for all factions
; - check the events when they're done, esp. Almoravid evolution events
; - adjust prices and time

; Note that Lamtuna Spearmen and Berber Pikemen will be available from territories without berber hidden resource (it's not an error) - a historical justification is that the recruits will come from the Maghreb to Iberia themselves, and then get recruited.

; While Siciliy expands into Maghrib/Andalous, they may build their Norman Stronghold buildings.
; This would be redundant - Alcazar is already such a stronghold. 
; To prevent it the following phrase is added below: and not building_present south_italy_building

; If you would modify this, bear in mind that in the EDCT there is:
;	and SettlementBuildingExists >= alcazar3_granada_alhambra_gardens	; coronation in Toledo, Granada, Zaragoza
;	and not SettlementBuildingExists >= alcazar7_lisbon					; but not in Lisbon, Fes, Tunis
	
;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
building alcazar_building
{
  levels alcazar1_walls alcazar2_alcazar alcazar3_granada_alhambra_gardens alcazar4_granada_alhambra_castle alcazar5_toledo alcazar6_zaragoza_aljaferia alcazar7_lisbon alcazar8_fes alcazar9_tunis
  {
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   Alcazar 1 (Walls)   ========================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================

	alcazar1_walls requires factions { moors, } or factions { spain, portugal, aragon, egypt, rum, zengid, abbasid, turks, } and not building_present south_italy_building and building_present_min_level builders builders2 and hidden_resource aragon or hidden_resource spain or hidden_resource portugal or hidden_resource moors
    {
      capability
      {
	;--- Public order, population, trade
	
        population_growth_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { all, } and not event_counter FL_policy_thinks_of_his_people 1
        population_growth_bonus bonus 2 requires factions { all, } and event_counter FL_policy_thinks_of_his_people 1
		
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { all, } and not event_counter FL_policy_merchant_skills 1
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires factions { all, } and event_counter FL_policy_merchant_skills 1

	;--- Units

		; in Spain - recruitment for the Muslims
		recruit_pool	"Berber Pikemen"		1	0.05	2  0  requires factions { middle_eastern, } and not hidden_resource berber and event_counter late_era 1
		; in Maghrib - adds to Ksar recruitment
		recruit_pool	"Berber Pikemen"		0	0.03	0  0  requires factions { all, } and hidden_resource berber and event_counter late_era 1
		recruit_pool	"Lamtuna Spearmen"	0	0.04	0  0  requires factions { all, } and hidden_resource berber
		
	;-Bonus for AI
        law_bonus bonus 1 requires event_counter ai_level_easy 1
		law_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter ai_level_medium 1
        law_bonus bonus 3 requires event_counter ai_level_hard 1
		law_bonus bonus 4 requires event_counter ai_level_veryhard 1

	;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	; UPKEEP/INCOME
		income_bonus bonus -50
      }
      material stone
      construction 6
      cost 6000
      settlement_min large_town
      upgrades
      {
      alcazar2_alcazar
      }
    }

;==============================================================================================================================
;---- Italian Traders ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==============================================================================================================================

; while moding this building, have a look at NAVIGATION_IN_WINTER - and increase trade accordingly

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@    ITALIAN TRADERS

{

;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================		SOUTH ITALY
;---- South Italy buildings -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================

; the buildings can be built in 6 Sicilian provinces (Palermo, Reggio, Bari, Naples, Ancona, Rome) by certain factions
; while the Sicilian faction can build lvl2 and lvl4 everywhere
; lvl2 (Stronhold) is possible to build already at town level - it will in practice mark the Sicialian ownership
; for now there're 6 buildings in the chain so 3 are possible to be added - perhaps related to the Aragon rule?
; there should also be a review of the related events once they are developed
; the units for other factions are yet to be added

; the units provided by this building consist of immigrating Normans thus there're no miniumum religion requirements

; note that historically this unit was being phased out, and the value of the very building diminished as the time passed by - this is why the Norman Serjeants disappear after event Transitional Armour
		
; Further work on this building chain:
; - check the events when they're done (esp. hattin)
; - add availability of the Norman units also for the other factions, not only sicily 
; - check Norman evolution events (when they're done) and insert correct ones for the units


; TO DO: EXCLUSION OF OTHER BUILDINGS:
;	and not building_present palazzo_building
;   and not building_present alcazar_building
 
;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
building south_italy_building
{
  convert_to south_italy_building
  levels south_italy_building1_fundaments south_italy_building2_stronghold south_italy_building3_casteldelmonte south_italy_building4_castel south_italy_building5_palazzodeinormanii south_italy_building6_maschioangioino
  {
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   South Italy Building 1 (Fundaments)   ======================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================
; event_counter faction_turn_catholic added only to make it invisible in the preview of possible buildings for the other factions (not sure if it works, though)

    south_italy_building1_fundaments requires not building_present alcazar_building and factions { sicily, } or factions { all, } and hidden_resource sicily and event_counter faction_turn_catholic 1 and not building_present alcazar_building
    {
      convert_to 0
      capability
      {
        law_bonus bonus 1 requires event_counter ai_level_easy 1
		law_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter ai_level_medium 1
        law_bonus bonus 3 requires event_counter ai_level_hard 1
		law_bonus bonus 4 requires event_counter ai_level_veryhard 1  
      } 
      material stone
      construction  6												; long time needed as establishment of political power takes time
      cost  6000
      settlement_min town
      upgrades
      {
	  south_italy_building2_stronghold
	  south_italy_building3_casteldelmonte
	  south_italy_building4_castel
	  south_italy_building5_palazzodeinormanii
	  south_italy_building6_maschioangioino
      }
    }
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   South Italy Building 2 (Norman Stronghold)   ===============================================================
;==================================================================================================================================

    south_italy_building2_stronghold requires event_counter dummy 1 or not event_counter CONCENTRIC_CASTLES 1 and not building_present alcazar_building and factions { sicily, } or factions { hre, england, france, jerusalem, papal_states, } and hidden_resource sicily and event_counter faction_turn_catholic 1 and not building_present alcazar_building
    {
      convert_to 1
      capability
      {

		recruit_pool	"Norman Serjeants"				0.8		0.07	2  0  requires factions { all, } and not event_counter ENGLAND3_MAGNA_CARTA 1

		recruit_pool	"Norman Cavalry"				0		0.03	0  0  requires factions { sicily, england, } and not event_counter BATTLE_HATTIN 1
		recruit_pool	"Dismounted Norman Cavalry"		0		0.03	0  0  requires factions { sicily, england, } and not event_counter BATTLE_HATTIN 1

		recruit_pool	"Norman Knights"				0		0.03	0  0  requires factions { sicily, } and event_counter BATTLE_HATTIN 1 and not event_counter TRANSITIONAL_ARMOR 1		
		recruit_pool	"Dismounted Norman Knights"		0		0.03	0  0  requires factions { sicily, } and event_counter BATTLE_HATTIN 1 and not event_counter TRANSITIONAL_ARMOR 1

		recruit_pool	"Chivalric Knights"				0		0.03	0  0  requires factions { sicily, } and event_counter TRANSITIONAL_ARMOR 1 		
		recruit_pool	"Dismounted Chivalric Knights"	0		0.03	0  0  requires factions { sicily, } and event_counter TRANSITIONAL_ARMOR 1 
			
        law_bonus bonus 1 requires not event_counter EDUCATION_PRIVILEGIUM_SCHOLASTICUM 1						; to be changed once evolution of the Sicilty faction is developed
        law_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter EDUCATION_PRIVILEGIUM_SCHOLASTICUM 1
        population_growth_bonus bonus 1 requires event_counter lateran_council4 1		; to be changed once evolution of the Sicilty faction is developed
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires not event_counter science_maths_zero_europe 1		; Liber Abaci
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter science_maths_zero_europe 1
		
        law_bonus bonus 1 requires event_counter ai_level_easy 1
		law_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter ai_level_medium 1
        law_bonus bonus 3 requires event_counter ai_level_hard 1
		law_bonus bonus 4 requires event_counter ai_level_veryhard 1
	;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	; UPKEEP/INCOME
		income_bonus bonus -50
      }
      material stone
      construction  6
      cost  8000
      settlement_min town
      upgrades
      {
	  south_italy_building3_casteldelmonte	  
	  south_italy_building4_castel

	  south_italy_building6_maschioangioino	  
      }
    }

;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================
;---- Hansa Teutonica -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================
;
; Available in low-level settlements (T1, then T2 and T3). It has two nodes:
; - all provinces with HR hanse can build baltic trade, then after certain events:
; -- German-inhabited (or settled) provinces (HR hre): Hansa of Merchants -> then after event Lubeck builds Holsteintor that enables another event allowing other cities Hansa of Cities
; -- provinces without German settlers: Faktorei -> four special cities after an event can build their unique Kontors
; Be very careful with changing HR - they play important part here (eg. only Lubeck should have both HR: poland and hre).
; Mind that there're provinces without access to the sea that will have this building.
; There's no limitation on the religion / faction basis - anybody can build (so you have to include also pic for each of 5 cultures).
; Hansa3 is available before hansa2 because it first the merchants developed and only then the trading posts started to provide significant income in the sending provinces.
;
; Events occur:
; HANSEATIC_LEAGUE - historically 1161, in-game ca. 1140-1160 (20-60 turns) - depending on how fast Szczecin and Lubeck are conquered.
; OSTSIEDLUNG - historically 1200, in-game ca. 1180-1200 (100-140 turns) - earlier date depends on the perfomance of the player.
; HANSEATIC_LEAGUE_EXPANDS - historically 1240, in-game 1190-1232 (120-200 turns)
; HANSEATIC_LUBECK - historically mid-13c, in-game 1232-1260 (200-260 turns)
; HANSEATIC_WARS - historically after 1284, in-game 1250-1290 (250-320 turns)
; HANSEATIC_COG - historically mid-13c, in-game   ca. 1280-1310 (300-350 turns)
; HANSEATIC_CONFEDERATION_OF_COLOGNE - historically 1356/60, in-game 1310-1360 (350-450 turns)
; PAVISE_SHIELDS 1320

; Possible modifications in the future
; - benefits from trade for Holsteintor Hanse of Cities scale with the number of Faktoreien built
; - new events (Lords of the North - after Charles IV visit to Lubeck; Grosse Karavel - the Gdansk karaka waging war with England)

; There is a problem: 
; - there should be requirement to have port before building hansa
; - one should add condition " "
; - but there're 2 provinces without possibility to build a port (Brandenburg, 

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@	HANSA TEUTONICA
building hansa_building
{
	convert_to hansa_building
	levels hansa1_baltic_trade hansa2_faktorei hansa3_of_merchants hansa4_of_cities hansa5_holsteintor hansa6_kontor_london hansa7_kontor_novgorod hansa8_kontor_bergen hansa9_kontor_brugge
    {
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   Hansa 1 (Baltic Trade)   ===================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================

		hansa1_baltic_trade requires factions { northern_european, eastern_european, southern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and event_counter HANSEATIC_LEAGUE 1 and hidden_resource hanse and building_present port or building_present castle_port or building_present river_access
		{
            convert_to 0
			capability
            {
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1	requires not event_counter OSTSIEDLUNG 1
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2	requires event_counter OSTSIEDLUNG 1
				
				recruit_pool	"Lettish Crossbowmen"	1	0.06   2  0  requires factions { all, } and event_counter OSTSIEDLUNG_CROSSBOWMEN 1

;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; UPKEEP/INCOME		
			income_bonus bonus 50
            }
            material wooden
            construction  8 
            cost  4000 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                hansa2_faktorei
                hansa3_of_merchants
				hansa4_of_cities						; after event HANSEATIC_COG there should be possibility to omit the Hansa of Merchants stage
            }
        }
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   Hansa 2 (Faktorei)   =======================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================

; and it's already for the lower level - let's forget about it

        {
            convert_to 1
            capability
            {
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3	requires not event_counter HANSEATIC_COG 1
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 4	requires event_counter HANSEATIC_COG 1
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1				
                law_bonus bonus -1
				happiness_bonus bonus -1 requires event_counter HANSEATIC_CONFEDERATION_OF_COLOGNE 1

				recruit_pool	"Lettish Crossbowmen"	1	0.06   2  0  requires factions { all, } and event_counter OSTSIEDLUNG_CROSSBOWMEN 1 and not event_counter MOUNTED_CROSSBOWS 1
				recruit_pool	"Lettish Crossbowmen"	1	0.07   2  1  requires factions { all, } and event_counter MOUNTED_CROSSBOWS 1 and not event_counter HANSEATIC_CONFEDERATION_OF_COLOGNE 1 
				recruit_pool	"Lettish Crossbowmen"	1	0.09   3  1  requires factions { all, } and event_counter HANSEATIC_CONFEDERATION_OF_COLOGNE 1

				recruit_pool	"cog"					0   0.1		0  0  requires factions { all, } and not event_counter HANSEATIC_WARS 1	
				recruit_pool	"cog"					0   0.2		0  0  requires factions { all, } and event_counter HANSEATIC_WARS 1	
				recruit_pool	"holk"  				0   0.1		0  0  requires factions { all, } and event_counter HANSEATIC_COG 1 and not event_counter HANSEATIC_CONFEDERATION_OF_COLOGNE 1

			income_bonus bonus 100				
            }

;---- Stavkirke  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================

; the building can be built in Norway provinces by all Christian factions 
; and everywhere by Norway
; the goal of this building is to provide Norway with some more axe-unit recuits,
; and also make it slightly easier to get money and control in the conquered provinces,
; and also to provide bonus to religion - when Orthodox religion is bordering with the Catholic and Pagan

; Further work on this building chain:
; - check Norway evolution events and relate them somehow

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@

{
  convert_to stavkirke_building
  levels stavkirke1 stavkirke2 stavkirke3 stavkirke4
  {  
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   Stavkirke 1 (Village Kirke)   ==========================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================
	
    stavkirke1 requires event_counter dummy 1 or not building_present rus_monastery and factions { norway, } or factions { denmark, scotland, england, hre, france, jerusalem, pisa, venice, sicily, aragon, spain, portugal, hungary, poland, } and not building_present rus_monastery and hidden_resource norway
    {
      convert_to 0	
      capability
      {
		law_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { norway, denmark, scotland, england, hre, france, jerusalem, pisa, venice, sicily, aragon, spain, portugal, hungary, poland, kievan_rus, russia, byzantium, georgia, serbia, }
		happiness_bonus bonus 1 requires not event_counter is_the_player 1

        religion_level bonus 0.5 requires factions { norway, denmark, scotland, england, hre, france, jerusalem, pisa, venice, sicily, aragon, spain, portugal, hungary, poland, }
		
		recruit_pool	"Bondir"		0   0.04	0  0  requires factions { norway, } and hidden_resource norway
		recruit_pool	"Axe Militia"	0   0.04	0  0  requires factions { norway, } and not hidden_resource norway

		recruit_pool	"Bondir"		0   0.03	0  0  requires factions { denmark, } and hidden_resource norway
		recruit_pool	"Axe Militia"	0   0.03	0  0  requires factions { denmark, } and not hidden_resource norway
		
	;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	; UPKEEP/INCOME	0
      }
      material wooden
      construction  3
      cost  2000

      upgrades

      }
    }

;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================		VAR
;---- Var  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================

; the building can be built in Hungarian and Serbian provinces by all Christian factions 
; and everywhere by Hungary
; the highest level (unique building, buildable only the capital) is the requirement for the Hungarian FL to get the crown

; Further work on this building chain:
; - adjustements in benefits

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
building var_building
{
  convert_to var_building
  levels var1_fundaments var2_wood_tower var3_wood_stronghold var4_fortified_house var5_stone_tower var6_knightly_castle var7_baronial_castle var8_royal_castle var9_visegrad
  {  
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   Var 1 (Fundaments)   =======================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================
	
    var1_fundaments city requires event_counter dummy 1 or not building_present rus_monastery and event_counter HUNGARY1A_NOBILITY 1 and factions { hungary, } or factions { scotland, england, hre, france, jerusalem, denmark, norway, pisa, venice, sicily, aragon, spain, portugal, poland, serbia, } and event_counter notre_dame 1 and not building_present rus_monastery and hidden_resource hungary or hidden_resource serbia
    {
      capability
      {
		happiness_bonus bonus 1
			
		;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		; UPKEEP/INCOME	0
      }
      material wooden
      construction  2
      cost  2000
      settlement_min town
      upgrades
      {
	  var2_wood_tower
	  var4_fortified_house
      }
    }

;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   Var 2 (Wood Tower)   =======================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================
	
    var2_wood_tower city requires event_counter dummy 1 or not building_present rus_monastery and event_counter HUNGARY1A_NOBILITY 1 and factions { hungary, } or factions { scotland, england, hre, france, jerusalem, denmark, norway, pisa, venice, sicily, aragon, spain, portugal, poland, serbia, } and event_counter notre_dame 1 and not building_present rus_monastery and hidden_resource hungary or hidden_resource serbia
    {
      capability
      {

;==================================================================================================================================
;================================================================================================================================== CHUDE
;---- Chude -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==================================================================================================================================
; This building is preplaced in a number of provinces of North-Eastern Europe at the beginning of the game (1132).
; Upgrade or rebuilding is possible in 12 provinces.
; It provides trade, happiness for pagan religion, and a AoR unit "Chude Militia", but decreases influence of all non-pagan religions.
; As the game progresses, the hinterland_farms will be build in the north of Europe and to progress with higher levels of farms, the Chude building will have to be dismantled. The player must do it himself, for the AI there's a script disbanding it every 25 years, starting after turn 200.
; The higher farm levels will also prevent from re-building Chude later on.
; Neither upkeep costs, nor direct income is assotiatied with this building.

; A strange phenomenon was observed in 2023: the initial number of recruits is 0, and only then the recruitment pools increase as usual.
; Coding seems not to impact it (see below - 3 different ways to coding, all ok).

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
building chude_building
{
  convert_to chude_building
  levels chude0_camp chude1_village chude2_town
  {
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   Chude 1 (Camp)   ===========================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================

    chude0_camp requires factions { northern_european, eastern_european, southern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and not building_present_min_level hinterland_farms farms4 and hidden_resource russia or hidden_resource cumans and hidden_resource unique1 or hidden_resource kievan_rus and hidden_resource unique1 or hidden_resource kievan_rus and hidden_resource unique2 or hidden_resource lithuania and hidden_resource unique1 or hidden_resource lithuania and hidden_resource unique2
    {
	  convert_to 0
      capability
      {
		trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
        religion_level bonus -1 requires factions { northern_european, hungary, poland, kievan_rus, russia, middle_eastern, greek, southern_european, }
		
		recruit_pool	"Chude Militia"		1	0.11	2	3	requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, eastern_european, middle_eastern, greek, } and event_counter early_era 1
		recruit_pool	"Chude Militia"		1	0.10	2	1	requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, eastern_european, middle_eastern, greek, } and event_counter high_era 1
		recruit_pool	"Chude Militia"		1	0.09 	2	0	requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, eastern_european, middle_eastern, greek, } and event_counter late_era 1

		happiness_bonus bonus 3 requires region_religion pagan 70
		happiness_bonus bonus 1 requires region_religion pagan 20 and not region_religion pagan 70	
      }
      material wooden
      construction  10
      cost  1000
      settlement_min village
      upgrades
      {
        chude1_village
      }
    }
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   Chude 2 (Village)   ========================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================

    chude1_village requires factions { northern_european, eastern_european, southern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and not building_present_min_level hinterland_farms farms2 and hidden_resource russia or hidden_resource cumans and hidden_resource unique1 or hidden_resource kievan_rus and hidden_resource unique1 or hidden_resource kievan_rus and hidden_resource unique2 or hidden_resource lithuania and hidden_resource unique1 or hidden_resource lithuania and hidden_resource unique2
    {
      convert_to 1
	  capability
      {
		trade_base_income_bonus bonus 4
        religion_level bonus -2 requires factions { northern_european, hungary, poland, kievan_rus, russia, middle_eastern, greek, southern_european, }

		recruit_pool	"Chude Militia"		1	0.14	2	4	requires event_counter early_era 1
		recruit_pool	"Chude Militia"		1	0.12	2	2	requires event_counter high_era 1
		recruit_pool	"Chude Militia"		1	0.10	2	0	requires event_counter late_era 1

		happiness_bonus bonus 5 requires region_religion pagan 70
		happiness_bonus bonus 2 requires region_religion pagan 20 and not region_religion pagan 70
      }
      material wooden
      construction  12
      cost  2000
      settlement_min town
      upgrades
      {
        chude2_town
      }
    }
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   Chude 3 (Town)   ===========================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================	

    chude2_town requires factions { northern_european, eastern_european, southern_european, greek, middle_eastern, } and not building_present_min_level hinterland_farms farms2 and hidden_resource russia or hidden_resource cumans and hidden_resource unique1 or hidden_resource kievan_rus and hidden_resource unique1 or hidden_resource kievan_rus and hidden_resource unique2 or hidden_resource lithuania and hidden_resource unique1 or hidden_resource lithuania and hidden_resource unique2
    {
      convert_to 2
	  capability
      {
		trade_base_income_bonus bonus 6
        religion_level bonus -3 requires factions { northern_european, hungary, poland, kievan_rus, russia, middle_eastern, greek, southern_european, }

		recruit_pool	"Chude Militia"		1	0.17	3	5	requires factions { all, } and event_counter early_era 1
		recruit_pool	"Chude Militia"		1	0.15	3	3	requires factions { all, } and event_counter high_era 1
		recruit_pool	"Chude Militia"		1	0.13	3	0	requires factions { all, } and event_counter late_era 1

		happiness_bonus bonus 7 requires region_religion pagan 70
		happiness_bonus bonus 3 requires region_religion pagan 20 and not region_religion pagan 70
      }
      material wooden

;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================		RUS MONASTERY
;---- Rus Monastery  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==================================================================================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================

; the buildings can be built in all provinces by the Rus factions, with the top levels only in certain (Novgorod, Pskov, Kiev)
; the other Orthodox factions can build these buildings in the Rus provinces
; the main goal of this building is to provide bonus to religion - when Orthodox religion is bordering with the Catholic and Pagan

; for now there're 6 buildings in the chain so 3 are possible to be added
; there should also be a review of the related events once they are developed

; Further work on this building chain:
; - check the events when they're done
; - check Rus evolution events and relate them somehow

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@

{
  convert_to rus_monastery
  levels rus_monastery_1enclosure rus_monastery_2skit rus_monastery_3lavra rus_monastery_4lavrasobor rus_monastery_5kiev rus_monastery_6novgorod rus_monastery_7pskov
  {
;==================================================================================================================================
;===================   Rus Monastery 1 (Monastic Enclosure)   =====================================================================
;==================================================================================================================================

    rus_monastery_1enclosure requires factions { kievan_rus, russia, } or factions { byzantium, georgia, serbia, } and not building_present stavkirke_building and hidden_resource kievan_rus or hidden_resource russia 
    {
      convert_to 0	
      capability
      {
		happiness_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { russia, kievan_rus, byzantium, georgia, serbia, } and region_religion orthodox 50 
		law_bonus bonus 1 requires not event_counter is_the_player 1
	;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	; UPKEEP/INCOME	0

      cost  2000
