; mind that a few wonders / unique buildings are also included in the other building lines:
; - The Aqueduct of Valens - in the building line "water"
; - Bait Al-Hikhma - in the building line "education"
; - Al-Azhar Mosque - in the building line "education"
; - many upper levels of regional building lines (Hansa, Rus Monastery, Alcazar)

; Most of wonders are religious-related: only factions from a certain religion should be able to build them.
; This is best coded with "requires factions { LIST OF ELIGIBIGLE FACTIONS, }" - to prevent display in the building browser for the factions that cannot built it (unfortunately, a failed (negative) "event_counter" does not prevent visibility).


;==============================================================================================================================
;==============================================================================================================================		HAGIA SOPHIA
;---- Constantinople - Hagia Sophia -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==============================================================================================================================
; historically all three religions used it as a temple at some point, but for the Greeks it was the cornerstone of the system
; for the moment it's not possible to convert it into a mosque but a script for it should be developed (along the Cordoba mosque)
; Constantinople has also other unique buildings - as top levels of the regular buildings: The Aqueduct of Valens, ...

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
building wonders2
{
  levels wonder_hagia_sophia
  {
;==============================================================================================================================
;===================   Hagia Sophia 1 (Chapel)   =========================================================================
;==============================================================================================================================

    wonder_hagia_sophia city requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, greek, poland, hungary, russia, kievan_rus, } and region_religion orthodox 50 and event_counter faction_turn_orthodox 1 and building_present_min_level builders builders4 and hidden_resource Constantinople
    {
      capability
      {	
        religion_level bonus 3 requires factions { greek, kievan_rus, russia, }
        religion_level bonus -3 requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, hungary, poland, }
        religion_level bonus -5 requires factions { middle_eastern, cumans, lithuania, }

        law_bonus bonus 5 requires factions { greek, kievan_rus, russia, }
        law_bonus bonus 3 requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, hungary, poland, cumans, lithuania, middle_eastern, }
		
		population_health_bonus bonus 10

	;-Diplomat recruitment (unique building)
	
        agent diplomat 0
        agent_limit diplomat 1

	;-Bonus for AI
        law_bonus bonus 1 requires event_counter ai_level_easy 1
		law_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter ai_level_medium 1
        law_bonus bonus 3 requires event_counter ai_level_hard 1
		law_bonus bonus 4 requires event_counter ai_level_veryhard 1

	;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	; UPKEEP/INCOME
	  }
      faction_capability
      {
      happiness_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { greek, kievan_rus, russia, }
      }		
      material stone
      construction  16
      cost  16000
      settlement_min large_city
      upgrades
      {
      }
    }
  }
  plugins
  {
  }
}

;============================================================================================================================== Holy Sepulchre
;---- Jerusalem - Holy Sepulchre ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;==============================================================================================================================
; the church (lvl2)  is already built in Jerusalem at the beginning of the game (1132)
; but it may get destroyed either in the fights (when the city is conqered), or demolished (by the player, because the AI doesn't demolish the buildings),
;   or it may burn through the "Great Fire" script. To enable the Great Fire end two additional levels are added:
; - level "burnt" -  it is not buildable but only received through script. To prevent the player from income from dismantling it, buid the price is low.
; - level chapel is added so that the first buildable level is not "burnt" one, and the normal upgrade will go directly to Church.

; still unused event: JERUSALEM20_HOLY_SEPULCHRE_RENOVATED

;@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
building holy_sepulchre
{
  levels holy_sepulchre_1_chapel holy_sepulchre_2_burnt holy_sepulchre_3_church
  {
    holy_sepulchre_1_chapel city requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, greek, poland, hungary, russia, kievan_rus, } and building_present_min_level builders builders2 and hidden_resource jerusalem and hidden_resource capital and event_counter faction_turn_catholic 1 or event_counter faction_turn_orthodox 1 
    {
      capability
      {
        happiness_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, eastern_european, greek, }
        religion_level bonus 1 requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, eastern_european, greek, }

	;--- own recruitment: free upkeep in Jerusalem

		recruit_pool	"Canons of the Holy Sepulcher"	0.8	0.04	2  0  requires factions { jerusalem, } and not event_counter lateran_council3 1
		recruit_pool	"Canons of the Holy Sepulcher"	0.8	0.06	2  0  requires factions { jerusalem, } and event_counter lateran_council3 1 and not event_counter lateran_council4 1	
		recruit_pool	"Canons of the Holy Sepulcher"	0.8	0.09	2  0  requires factions { jerusalem, } and event_counter lateran_council4 1 and not event_counter new_era_begins 1		
		recruit_pool	"Canons of the Holy Sepulcher"	0.8	0.06	2  0  requires factions { jerusalem, } and event_counter new_era_begins 1 and not event_counter high_era 1	
		
	;-Bonus for AI
        law_bonus bonus 1 requires event_counter ai_level_easy 1
		law_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter ai_level_medium 1
        law_bonus bonus 3 requires event_counter ai_level_hard 1
		law_bonus bonus 4 requires event_counter ai_level_veryhard 1

	;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	; UPKEEP/INCOME
		income_bonus bonus 200
	  }
      material stone
      construction  6
      cost  6000
      settlement_min large_town
      upgrades
      {
		holy_sepulchre_2_burnt
		holy_sepulchre_3_church		
      }
    }
    holy_sepulchre_2_burnt city requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, greek, poland, hungary, russia, kievan_rus, } and building_present_min_level builders builders2 and hidden_resource jerusalem and event_counter dummy 1
    {
      capability
      {
        religion_level bonus 1 requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, eastern_european, greek, }
		
		recruit_pool	"Canons of the Holy Sepulcher"	0.8	0.06	2  0  requires factions { jerusalem, } and not event_counter lateran_council3 1
		recruit_pool	"Canons of the Holy Sepulcher"	0.8	0.08	2  0  requires factions { jerusalem, } and event_counter lateran_council3 1 and not event_counter lateran_council4 1	
		recruit_pool	"Canons of the Holy Sepulcher"	0.8	0.11	2  0  requires factions { jerusalem, } and event_counter lateran_council4 1 and not event_counter new_era_begins 1		
		recruit_pool	"Canons of the Holy Sepulcher"	0.8	0.08	2  0  requires factions { jerusalem, } and event_counter new_era_begins 1 and not event_counter high_era 1	

	;-Bonus for AI
        law_bonus bonus 1 requires event_counter ai_level_easy 1
		law_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter ai_level_medium 1
        law_bonus bonus 3 requires event_counter ai_level_hard 1
		law_bonus bonus 4 requires event_counter ai_level_veryhard 1

	;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	  }
      material stone
      construction 1
      cost  1
      settlement_min large_town
      upgrades
      {
		holy_sepulchre_3_church		  
      }
    }
	holy_sepulchre_3_church city requires factions { northern_european, southern_european, greek, poland, hungary, russia, kievan_rus, } and building_present_min_level builders builders2 and hidden_resource jerusalem and hidden_resource capital and event_counter faction_turn_catholic 1 or event_counter faction_turn_orthodox 1

; this building is used in the faction re-emergence script

building hidden_temporary_buildings
{
 levels hidden_bonus_building hidden_malus_building
 {
    hidden_bonus_building city requires factions {   }
    {
       capability
        {
            law_bonus bonus 25 requires not building_present_min_level hidden_temporary_buildings hidden_malus_building
            population_health_bonus bonus 25 requires not building_present_min_level hidden_temporary_buildings hidden_malus_building
            happiness_bonus bonus 25 requires not building_present_min_level hidden_temporary_buildings hidden_malus_building
        }
        material wooden
        construction  1
        cost  0
        settlement_min village
        upgrades
        {
            hidden_malus_building
        }
    }
    hidden_malus_building city requires factions {   }
    {
        capability
        {

            population_health_bonus bonus -25
            happiness_bonus bonus -25
        }
        material wooden
        construction  1
        cost  0
        settlement_min village
        upgrades
        {
        }
    }
 }
